title: Embedded Iframe
subtitle: Generate and manage embeddable lead forms

configuration.title: Iframe Configuration
configuration.showLogoDescription: Display your logo in the form
configuration.darkModeDescription: Allow users to toggle dark theme

embedCode.title: Embed Code
embedCode.description: Copy this code to embed the form on your website
embedCode.tips1: Add the iframe to any HTML page or CMS
embedCode.tips2: The form will match your site's theme automatically
embedCode.tips3: All submissions are captured in your lead dashboard
embedCode.tips4: HTTPS is required for iframe embedding
